title: Possibly custom - looking for something similar
content:
Hi guys,

Im looking for something similar to the type in the image below. Possibly this is custom, a layered font or one in eps form, as one would need to custom color the parts.

Any ideas if something similar exhists readymade and for sale?

thanks in advance!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017054622im_/http:/typophile.com/files/disney-project_1x_5131.jpeg)
author: mike.j

comments.content:
Definitely custom. Here's a font made to simulate cut paper, but the positive and negative spaces would need to be switched...  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/paper-caper-nf/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017054622/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/paper-caper-nf/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/paper-caper-nf/")
